name: Baylan Skoll
subtitle: Seeking Higher Power
text: Resilience. After you resolve this die showing damage, you may turn an opponent's character die to any side. Power Action - Resolve this die. Then roll this die into your pool and resolve it, if able, decreasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.

name: Dagan Gera
subtitle: Jedi Knight Marauder
text: Power Action - Reveal 2 cards from your hand that share a cost. Then, if the cost of those cards is: 0: Draw a card; 1: Deal 1 damage to a character; 2: Turn a die to any side; 3 or more: Gain 1 resource. "You're still chained by the past. It will be your grave."

name: Darth Plagueis
subtitle: The Wise
text: Power Action - Spot a die showing a cost to heal damage equal to its cost from a character. Then you may spot a different die showing a cost to heal damage equal to its cost from a different character.

name: Marrok
subtitle: Mysterious Warrior
text: Guardian. Power Action - Remove one of your Blue dice to play a downgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. If that downgrade was a curse, gain 1 action. Marrok once served in the Inquisitorius of the Galactic Empire.

name: Shin Hati
subtitle: Force Sensitive Mercenary
text:
Piloting.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield or deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of dice in any pool showing a value of 0, to a maximum of 3.
?One parting lesson, Shin. Impatience for victory will guarantee defeat.? - Baylan Skoll

name: Emergence
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.

name: Exploit Weakness
text: Choose a player and turn 2 of their dice to sides showing a blank. Then you may choose a different player and resolve 1 of their dice as if it were showing a focus.

name: The Chosen One
text:
Play only if you have exactly one Blue character die in your pool.
Resolve that character die, increasing its value by 1.

name: Your Thoughts Betray You
text: Spot a Blue character to choose a color. Then discard a random card in a player's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.

name: Awaiting Fate
text: After the action phase begins, place 1 resource on this card. Action - Remove up to 3 resources from this plot to turn that many dice to sides showing a blank. Set this plot aside to gain 1 action.

name: Great Mothers
text: After you play a card with an odd cost, you may exhaust this support to heal 1 damage from a character.After you play a curse, you may ready this support. "The thread of destiny demands it."

name: Power
text: After you resolve a die showing melee damage, place 1 resource on this card. Action - Discard this support from play to remove a die showing a value less than the number of resources on this support.

name: RP82 Fiend Fighter
text: After this vehicle is piloted by Shin Hati, you may turn a character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if there is a die showing a blank in any player's pool.

name: Dagan Gera's Lightsaber
text: Redeploy.Action - Exhaust this upgrade. Then reveal 2 cards from your hand that share a cost to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. If this upgrade is on Dagan Gera, gain 1 action.

name: Force Choke
text:
Blue character only.
Before a die is turned to a side showing a blank, you may exhaust this upgrade to remove that die instead.
"My lady is that any way to treat your rightful ruler?" - Maul

name: Enoch
subtitle: Captain Of The Guard
text:
After one of your effects defeats an opponent's character, this character gains one of its character dice. 
[special] - Gain 1 resource or roll a die on a Red upgrade or support you control with a cost of 3 or less into your pool.

name: Moff Gideon
subtitle: Remnant Warlord
text: Resilience. After a card is discarded from an opponent?s hand by a die or card effect, deal 1 indirect damage to that opponent. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1 if you have more cards in hand than an opponent.

name: Morgan Elsbeth
subtitle: Vindictive Witch
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. You may include Blue villain cards in your deck. After you resolve a die showing an odd value, place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 4 resources from this card to roll a set-aside Thrawn ([SoH]23) die into your pool.

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Strategic Mind
text: After you activate this character, you may look at an opponent's hand and place 1 card from their hand on top of their deck. Then that opponent may deal 2 indirect damage to themselves to draw a card.

name: Assume I Know Everything
text: Spot a Red character to discard cards from an opponent's hand equal to the number of different damage symbols showing on your dice.

name: Long Live The Empire
text:
Choose and do one of the following:
- Discard an event from your hand to remove a die not showing damage.
- Discard a non-event card from your hand to remove a die showing damage.

name: Imperial Security
text: Reveal the top card of a deck. Then you may spend resources up to that card's cost to remove that many dice, to a maximum of 2.

name: Oppress Freedom
text: Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less. Then you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to discard a random card from their hand. If that card was an event, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Chimaera
text: After you activate this support, if this die did not roll damage, discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Power Action - Reveal the top card of your deck, or any deck instead if you can spot Thrawn. You may play that card, if able.

name: Night Troopers
text: After a trooper character you control is defeated, this support gains 1 of that character's character dice. "The blessing of the Great Mothers shall protect you in battle against the Jedi." - Morgan Elsbeth

name: Electrostaff
text:
Ambush.Redeploy.
While this upgrade is on Moff Gideon or on a guard, you may resolve this die as if it did not have a modifier.

name: Imperial Control
text: After a card is discarded from a player's hand by a die or card effect, you may exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.

name: Dengar
subtitle: The Demolisher
text:
After setup, if this character is elite, defeat it unless you spend 1 resource.
After you activate this character, if any of this character's character dice just rolled a blank, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Gorian Shard
subtitle: Pirate King
text:
After you resolve a die showing a cost, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has an exhausted character and no dice showing damage, you may resolve one of your dice showing a cost decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Rayvis
subtitle: Gen'dai Jedi Slayer
text:
After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from this character.
After you deal damage to one of your characters for the first time each action phase, you may exhaust an upgrade on this character to roll that upgrade's die into your pool.

name: Vane
subtitle: Nikto Captain
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, you may choose one of your character dice and an opponent's character die. Turn each of them to a side showing the value showing on the other die.

name: 4-LOM
text: While you control Zuckuss, this card has Redeploy. 4-LOM was an ambitious protocol droid who overrode his programming and became a galactic thief and later a bounty hunter.

name: No Escape
text: After attached character is activated, you may exhaust this downgrade to resolve one of your bounty hunter dice. After attached character is defeated, you may roll a die on a bounty hunter you control into your pool.

name: Detonation
text: Resolve up to 2 of your dice as if they were showing indirect damage, increasing each of their values by 1 if one or more of those dice were showing damage.

name: Influenced
text:
Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to choose and do one of the following:
- Deal 1 damage to a character.
- Turn a die to any side.
- Draw a card.

name: Thrifty
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a cost to remove a die.

name: Cumulus-Class Corsair
text: After you activate this support, you may activate a pirate, scoundrel, or vehicle you control. Power Action - Roll a set-aside Pirate snub fighter (AF38) die in to your pool.

name: Pirate Snub Fighter
text: Ambush. Power Action - Resolve a die showing a disrupt to turn a die to any side.

name: Zuckuss
text: Power Action - Spot 4-LOM to ready this support. [special] - Gain 1 resource or deal damage to a character equal to the number of downgrades on that character.

name: Swindler
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose a player and either force them to gain 1 resource or force them to lose 1 resource. Then choose an opponent and deal indirect damage to them equal to the difference in the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 4.

name: Nihil Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you deal damage to attached character for the first time each action phase, you may reroll a die.

name: HK-87 Assassin Droid
text:
Guardian.
After you deal damage to one of your characters, place 1 resource on this card.
[special] - Gain 1 resource or remove up to 4 resources from this character to deal that much unblockable indirect damage to an opponent.

name: A350 Blaster Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on a non-unique character, you may search your deck or discard pile for another copy of this upgrade and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Jedi Remnant
text: Resilience. Decrease the cost of the first upgrade with "Lightsaber" in its title you play on this character each game by 1. Power Action - Resolve one of your weapon dice showing damage, either increasing its value by 1 or resolving it against 2 different characters.

name: Bokken Jedi
text: After this character is activated, if there is an ability attached to them, you may turn one of your dice to a side showing the same symbol as this die. If there is a weapon attached to this character, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1 if it is showing the same symbol as one of your other dice.

name: Professor Huyang
subtitle: Architect Droid
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you resolve a die with "Lightsaber" in its title, you may place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this character to make a unique upgrade with "Lightsaber" in its title elite (it gains another copy of its die).

name: Cal Kestis
subtitle: Jedi Survivor
text:
After setup, this character gains the color Yellow.
You may include Yellow upgrades in your deck (following other deck building restrictions).
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may reveal a Yellow card from your hand to deal 1 damage to a character. You may reveal a Blue card from your hand to heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Cere Junda
subtitle: Keeper Of The Archives
text: Guardian. After setup, add a set-aside Jedi Archives ([set ref]) to your play area. [special] - Turn a die to any side. If that die is showing a value of: 0: Draw a card; 1: Heal 1 damage from a character; 2 or more: give a character 1 shield.

name: Anakin Skywalker's Teachings
text:
Activate one of your characters. Then, if you just rolled a die showing damage, deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
?One is never too old to learn, Snips." - Anakin Skywalker

name: Clarity Of Purpose
text:
Ambush.
Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing a shield.
Ezra's out there somewhere, and it's time to bring him home." - Sabine Wren

name: Shielding Stance
text:
Activate a Blue character you control to remove a die. Then if the die removed was showing damage give that character 1 shield.
"This little one's not worth the effort." - Obi-Wan Kenobi

name: Stay Together
text:
Renew 1.
Reroll one of your character dice and another die. Then, if neither die is showing a blank, give a character 1 shield.

name: Ahsoka Tano's T-6 Jedi Shuttle
text:
Your Ahsoka Tano and Professor Huyang have Piloting.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character or play a card with "Lightsaber" in its title from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Bokken Saber
text: While this upgrade is on an apprentice or a non-unique Blue character, you may resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not showing a modifier. Bokken sabers were wooden swords used for combat training.

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
While this upgrade is on Luke Skywalker, he has Resilience.
After you exhaust this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.

name: Carson Teva
subtitle: New Republic Captain
text: Piloting. After one of your pilot or vehicle dice is removed, you may place 1 damage on a support or give a character 1 shield. [special] - Move 2 damage from a support to a character or vice versa.

name: Greef Karga
subtitle: High Magistrate
text: Charm. After an opponent draws a card during the action phase for the first time each round, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1. Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to force that character's controller to draw a card.

name: Jan Dodonna
subtitle: General
text: Resilience. After setup, add a set-aside Rebel Trooper (AWK30) to your team, or two Rebel Troopers instead if this character is elite. Power Action - Resolve one of your support dice for free without removing it from your pool.

name: Tech
subtitle: Intellectual Soldier
text: Piloting. Power Action - Draw a card. Then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. [special] - Search your deck or discard pile for a Red weapon or vehicle and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: New Republic Bureaucracy
text: After one of attached character's character dice is resolved or removed, place 1 resource on this downgrade. Action - Exhaust this downgrade and remove 2 resources from it to play a Red card, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Bacta Spray
text: Heal 1 damage from a character. Then, if all of your characters share a color or subtype, heal 1 damage from another character.

name: Opportunistic Offense
text: Play an upgrade from your hand (paying its cost) to either remove a die or deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to that upgrade's cost.

name: Warfare
text:
After you play a Red support, you may exhaust this plot to deal 1 damage to an exhausted character.
"It is one thing to sacrifice yourself. To sacrifice others is something else entirely?"
-Jan Dodonna

name: A-Wing
text: Ambush. Power Action - Spot another copy of this support to roll this die into your pool. The RZ-1 A-wing Interceptor was a wedge-shaped starfighter manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering.

name: Hammerhead Corvette
text: Power Action - Discard this support from play to either discard a support from play or remove up to 2 dice. Draw a card.

name: Hunter's Knife
text:
Damage dealt by this die is unblockable.
After you resolve this die, you may use an action on a card you control. (You may not use a power action if it has already been used this round).

name: Medic
text:
After you heal damage from a character, you may exhaust this upgrade to heal 1 damage from a character. 
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Ruler Of Mandalore
text: After you resolve this die showing damage, you may give a character 1 shield. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from a non-plot card you control to resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Loyal Companion
text: Guardian. Piloting. After you activate a scoundrel, if one or more of its dice just rolled a resource, place 1 charm token on a card in play. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a resource as if it were showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1.

name: Din Djarin
subtitle: Mandalorian Peacemaker
text:
After this character gains 1 or more shields, you may exhaust an upgrade on this character to reroll a die.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has an exhausted upgrade.

name: Paz Vizsla
subtitle: Last Man Standing
text:
Guardian.
Before this character would be defeated by damage, instead defeat it after this round ends.

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Spectre Prodigy
text:
Team Up 1: Ahsoka Tano.
After setup, this character gains the color Blue.
After you activate this character, you may reroll a die. Then, if that die is showing damage, deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Battle Confidence
text:
Ambush.
Choose one of the following card types: support or upgrade. Give a character shields equal to the number of cards of the chosen type you can spot.

name: Digging For Answers
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Then place them on the top or bottom of your deck in any order. You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card.

name: Honor And Loyalty
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a color.
Remove a die. Then you may turn a die to any side. If the die you just turned was in your pool, you may resolve it.

name: Walking Carpet
text: If you control the character with the highest point value, roll one of its character dice into your pool. If an opponent controls the character with the highest point value, remove a character die.

name: Grogu
text:
You may spot this support as if it were a Blue character.
[special] - Remove an opponent's die and heal 1 damage from a character. Spot Din Djarin to give him 1 shield.

name: Kom'rk-Class Fighter
text: This support enters play with 3 shields on it. Power Action - Move 1 shield from this support to a non-plot card in play.

name: Partisan Pistol
text:
This upgrade enters play with 2 resources on it.
After you resolve this die, remove 1 resource from this upgrade. Discard this upgrade from play if there are no resources on it.

name: Sabine's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on Sabine Wren, gain 1 action.
You may resolve attached character's character dice showing ranged damage as if they were showing melee damage.

name: Far, Far Away
text: After you resolve a vehicle die, place 1 resource on this plot. Action - Remove 12 resources from this plot and set this plot aside. Then spot a hero character to add a set-aside Ezra Bridger (DOP70) to your team. He gains the color Blue. If this plot is elite, make him elite.

name: Noti Villager
text: After a character die is rerolled by a die or card effect, you may exhaust this support to turn it to a side showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Agility
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank to turn an opponent's die to any side.

name: The Force
text: Action - Spot a Blue character and exhaust this plot to reroll a die.

name: Anakin Skywalker's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you control Anakin Skywalker or Darth Vader.
[special] - Roll a set-aside Darth Vader (ATG1) die into your pool.

name: Unconventional Form
text:
This support enters play with 2 shields on it.
After one of your dice rolls a side showing melee damage, you may remove 1 shield token from this support and exhaust it to turn one of your other dice to a side showing ranged damage.

name: Bygone Lightsaber
text: Redeploy. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is a Jedi or Sith.

name: Strong With The Force
text: Blue character only. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll any number of attached character's upgrade dice. Then you may resolve one of the dice you just rerolled, increasing its value by 1.

name: Astral Henge
subtitle: Seatos
text: Power Action - Turn an opponent's character die to any side. Then choose one of your character dice and turn it to a side showing the same symbol and value, if possible.

name: Senate Guard
text:
Guardian.
After this character is defeated, give a character 2 shields.
After you activate this character, if this character is elite, roll a set-aside Stun Baton (Leg74) die into your pool.

name: Collateral Damage
text:
Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to resolve one of your Red dice, increasing its value by 1.
"Roger, roger."

name: Last Resort
text: Defeat a character you control or discard an upgrade or support you control from play to remove a die and heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Stand Down!
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each different damage symbol showing on your dice.
Remove a die.
Mandalorian warriors loyal to the Empire, Imperial Super Commandos were deadly and efficient enforcers.

name: Tides Of Battle
text:
Ambush.
If you control the battlefield, deal 1 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 1 shield.

name: Z-6 Rotary Blaster Cannon
text: After you play this upgrade, if it is on a trooper, you may roll this die into your pool. [special] - Deal 2 damage to up to 2 different characters.

name: Remnant Headquarters
subtitle: Mandalore
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to choose an opponent. Then discard a random card from that player's hand. If that player has no cards in their hand, deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Merrin
subtitle: Adaptive Nightsister
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. After you play a card with an odd cost, you may place 1 shield on a non-plot card in play. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from a non-plot card you control to turn a hero or villain die to a side showing a value of 0.

name: Mok Shaiz's Majordomo
subtitle: Negotiator
text: Charm. Power Action - Remove a charm token from a character to force its controller to choose and discard a card from their hand. Then that player may deal 1 damage to a character. A richly attired Twi?lek who handles much of the Mos Espa mayor?s personal affairs.

name: Long Shot
text: Choose a symbol and a value to reroll a die. Then, if that die rolled the chosen symbol or value, you may spend 1 resource to remove a different die.

name: Outmaneuver
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your character dice showing damage to remove a die.

name: Prospering Galaxy
text: Resolve any number of your dice each showing a different symbol. Then, if you just resolved 5 or more dice, draw 2 cards and heal 2 damage from a character.

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Ambush. Resolve one of your scoundrel, vehicle, or pilot dice showing a resource, rerolling it instead of removing it.

name: Salvaged Legacy
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the value showing on a die.

name: Boba Fett's Bacta Chamber
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Power Action - Remove one of your character dice to heal 1 damage from that character, or 2 damage instead if that die was showing damage.

name: Jawa Reclaim
text: Discard one of your cards from play to play a card from your hand, decreasing its cost by the cost of the discarded card.

name: Neutralize
text:
Ambush.
Exhaust an upgrade you control to remove a die.

name: Plan B
text:
Spot a plot to remove a die.
Navarro is a very fine planet. And now that the scum and villainy have been washed away, it?s very respectable again.? - Greef Karga

name: Pretty Gutsy Move, Kid!
text:
Choose and do one of the following, or both in any order instead if you have another copy of this card in your discard pile:
- Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of dice showing a modifier.
- Turn up to 2 dice to a side showing a modifier.

name: What Do You Sacrifice?
text: Remove 1 resource from a non-plot card in play to either gain 1 resource or place 1 resource on a different non-plot card in play.

name: Dangerous Gambit
text: After the upkeep phase begins, if you control 2 or more characters, force an opponent to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character you control.

name: GNK Droid
text:
After you resolve this die, you may turn a die to its first side (the topmost box of its dice reference).
"Gonk, gonk! Gonk! GONK. Gonk Gonk! GONK."

name: Amban Sniper Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
After this upgrade is exhausted, you may either draw a card or force an opponent to discard a random card from their hand.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character. You may exhaust this upgrade to reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Cycler Rifle
text: You cannot resolve this die unless this upgrade is exhausted. Power Action - Remove one of your dice to exhaust this upgrade.

name: Great Forge
subtitle: Mandalore
text: Power Action - Ready or exhaust an upgrade (yours or an opponent's). The Great Forge was a forge located on Mandalore. It was large and ornate, and the air rang with the music of a hundred hammers.

name: Outlands
subtitle: Peridea
text: Power Action - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. You may place that card on the bottom of their deck. You may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do, you may place that card on the bottom of your deck.
